title: Figma Tutorial - A Free UI Design/Prototyping Tool. It's awesome.
description: Figma is a web-based (with a companion desktop app enabled by Electron) UI design and prototyping tool. In this tutorial, I create a mobile layout while discovering many of its features. I have to say, this is perhaps the strongest contender against Adobe XD. What do you think?

title: Design A Clothing Website Using Figma | Speed Art | Part 1/2
description: This video is centered around designing the user interface for the clothing website. The design is based on a small brand selling apparels and accessories. So the landing page includes the curated list of featured products. I went with the full width & height design and tried to make it more pleasing to the user.

title: eCommerce Web Design Figma Tutorial
description: Hi everyone, welcome back to Angga Risky, and in this video, we will learn how to design and prototype for website e-commerce using figma.com

title: Figma Tutorial: Boolean Operation
description: In this video we'll learn how to combine shapes using each of the four Boolean Operations: Union, Subtract, Intersect, and Exclude.

title: #02: Figma Object Selection Tips
description: Figma is fast becoming one of the industry’s favorite design and prototype tools. In this series of videos Kezz Bracey will walk you through an extensive collection of tips and tricks, so you’ll be working with Figma like a pro in no time!
